value:
Yeah, I've smashed a few Sacred
Stones. Lot of fuss over something
so fragile.

I like this world. No shortage of
battles here! Climbing the ranks
through war suits me perfectly.

I like this castle. It'd make a suitable
palace when I take over, wouldn't it?
Oh, don't get incensed. Only kidding.

Do you want a job when you're done
summoning for Askr? If I had you
with me, no one could stop us.

Let me give you a little advice...
When you're across the table from
someone, watch both their hands.

You're the $Nu
$Nf spoke of?
Huh. All right.

You're just another stepping-stone
on my way to the throne!

Well done. Now, is there something
you want from me?
Wait, that's all? Hang on a second!

Good, good. With this, I could...yes...
Don't worry, I don't have any plans.
Not yet.

Ah-haha! I'm Caellach, and I will be
king one day! Stick with me, and I'll
see you get yours.

It's been long enough. Are you ready
to join me? ...I suppose you still have
business here—but the offer stands!$k$pYou may not understand it, but I have
a vision for myself! I was born a man
in this world, and that means...$k$pLike all men, my dream is to be king!
And I'll do whatever it takes to make
that dream come true.$k$pY'know... You could always abandon
this place and join forces with me.$k$pAnd do what? It's obvious, isn't it!
We'd conquer! It won't be easy, but
with you by my side, we can do it!
そらっ
I'll bring you down.
ぐあっ
Dammit...
Well, so long.
So feeble.
Don't take it personally.
I'm moving up.
One step from the throne...
Hmph
The name's Caellach, but some call me the Tiger Eye. I fought in the desert as a mercenary.
What's the big idea? Looking for a fight?
Hah! So that hunk of rock is a Sacred Stone, eh? Seems kind of fragile...
I'm sick to death of living like a desert rat. I'm going to be a king one day.
I'm not like that freak Valter. I'm kind to women.
My palace... Oh, how I do like the sound of that.
I like you. You've got guts.
Whatever you say.
Not that I care, but...
Follow me.
